Sentencas: In order to improve the catalytic activity of Sr0.8La0.2TiO3 (SLT)-Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 (GDC) composite anodes, Pd was impregnated as a co-catalyst using a glycine mediated impregnation method.
Titulo: Effect of Pd-impregnation on the electrochemical performance of Sr0.8La0.2TiO3-Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 composite anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: When glycine was added into the Pd precursor solution, nanosized Pd particles with the average particle size being approximately 20 nm were homogeneously distributed onto the SLT-GDC backbone.
Titulo: Effect of Pd-impregnation on the electrochemical performance of Sr0.8La0.2TiO3-Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 composite anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The polarization resistance (R-p) was significantly reduced by the impregnation of Pd due to the enlargement of the triple phase boundary (TPB) length, which promotes ionic exchange reactions at the anode/electrolyte interface, as well as the dissociation of H-2 molecules.
Titulo: Effect of Pd-impregnation on the electrochemical performance of Sr0.8La0.2TiO3-Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 composite anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The maximum power density of the single cell also increased significantly as the amount of Pd increased.
Titulo: Effect of Pd-impregnation on the electrochemical performance of Sr0.8La0.2TiO3-Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 composite anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Moreover, the single cell with a Pd-impregnated SLT-GDC15 anode showed a comparable performance using both CH4 and H-2 fuel, which indicates that the Pd-impregnated SLT-GDC composite anode can be used for hydrocarbon-fueled SOFC as well.
Titulo: Effect of Pd-impregnation on the electrochemical performance of Sr0.8La0.2TiO3-Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 composite anodes for solid oxide fuel cells
